org.neuroph.contrib.neat.experiment.xor
Class XorFitnessFunction

java.lang.Object
  org.neuroph.contrib.neat.gen.operations.fitness.AbstractFitnessFunction
      org.neuroph.contrib.neat.experiment.xor.XorFitnessFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
FitnessFunction
public class XorFitnessFunction
extends AbstractFitnessFunction

Implementation of the XOR fitness function that runs the four tests to determine how well the Organism as implemented the XOR function.

Author:
Aidan Morgan

Evaluates the provided Organism using the provided NeuralNetwork and return it's fitness.

performTest

public static double performTest(org.neuroph.core.NeuralNetwork nn,
                                 double one,
                                 double two,
                                 double expected)
Performs a XOR test using the provided NeuralNetwork.

Parameters:
nn - the NeuralNetwork under test.
organismId - the id of the Organism which the NeuralNetwork is created from.
one - the first parameter to the XOR function.
two - the second parameter to the XOR function.
expected - the expected return value of the XOR function given the two parameters.
Returns:
the difference between the expected return value and the value returned by the NeuralNetwork
